title: Loophole in riots AFK prevention system :)
body: Riot doesn't want you to leave games, Right? What if you're just feeding and your team wants to win so they ask you to afk if you're not going to play correctly. Well, that's a damn shame that I'll get banned if I don't continue to feed. So what would I prefer? Obviously I will continue to feed because I don't want to get banned. So really, Riot is forcing people to feed. ggwp.
